text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Currency" means currency and coin of the United States or any other country.
"Department" means the Department of Labor, Licensing, and Regulation.

"Person engaged in a trade or business" means an individual, partnership, limited liability company, firm, trust, estate, association, corporation, or other entity:
engaged in vehicle sales, including motor vehicle, airplane, and boat sales;
that conducts real estate closings and settlements; or
engaged in the sale or pledging of jewelry.
"Secretary" means the Secretary of Labor, Licensing, and Regulation.
